Job Title: Pipefitter / Fabricator (Maintenance)

Location: Winston-Salem, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Description

Pipefitter / Fabricator (Maintenance)

£36,500 + Overtime + Days Only + 16% Combined Pension Scheme + 39 Days Holiday + Holiday Rollover + Pay and Roll Progression + Paid Qualifications

Stocksbridge

Are you an engineer with a welding, pipefitting or fabrication background, looking for a stable and permanent role within a well-established, award winning and highly successful company that is a world leading manufacturer. They have excellent staff retention and your work will be rewarded generously with a fantastic renumeration package alongside great benefits and perks.

Are you a skilled and dedicated professional looking for a challenging role in a heavy engineering plant environment? This is an exciting opportunity for a pipefitter / welder to play an integral part of the team.

On offer is the opportunity for the right candidate to use their fabrication experience and there knowledge of using a variety of welding equipment and processes to join the structural department in their day to day maintenance of the site.

This company is a leading player in the steel industry with a strong commitment to innovation and continuous improvement. This company values safety, quality, and efficiency who are offering a dynamic work environment and excellent opportunities for professional growth.

The Role

Deliver both reactive and preventative maintenance in a heavy engineering plant environmentFollow routine planned maintenance schedulesResponsible for own workload and ensure all tasks are completed to relevant deadlinesCarry out pipework fabrication, installations & replacement across the site to agreed plansDays only role

The Person

Experience in Pipefitting, Welding (MMA, MIG, TIG, Oxy-fuel cutting) and working with a variety of welding equipmentStructural Steel Experience

Reference: BBBH12867

Engineer, Engineering, Welding, Structural Steel, Structural Technician, Sheffield, Rotherham, Stocksbridge, CSWIP, Pipefitter, Fabrication, Maintenance

If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV.

We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all suitable candidates. The salary advertised is a guideline for this position. The offered renumeration will be dependent on the extent of your experience, qualifications, and skill set.

Ernest Gordon Recruitment Limited acts as an employment agency for permanent recruitment and employment business for the supply of temporary workers. By applying for this job, you accept the T&C's, Privacy Policy and Disclaimers which can be found at our website.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
